casebody.data:
In the Matter of Harry H. LEVEY, Bankrupt. Manufacturers’ Trust Company, Appellant, Irving Trust Company, Trustee, Appellee. No. 141. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 3, 1934. Newman & Bisco, of New York City (Leonard G. Bisco and Milton E. Lynn, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Krause, Hirsch & Levin, of New York City (George C. Levin and Morris M. Marcus, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order (9 F. Supp. 173) affirmed.
